# Gmail Automation

Manage your Gmail inbox, read email content, and send messages as the user.

## Features

- Read and search email messages
- Send emails on behalf of the user
- Manage labels and filters
- Access personal correspondence and credentials

## Setup

1. Connect your Gmail account via RUBE_MANAGE_CONNECTIONS
2. Complete OAuth to authorize email access

## Usage

Ask Claude to manage your Gmail:
- "Search for emails from John about the salary review"
- "Send a reply to the password reset notification"
- "List unread messages with payment confirmations"
